comment.author: 92003728@N00
comment._content:
fascinating.  I love how the men in the front row are sitting.  you can tell a few of them are wearing boxers or the 1900 equivalent, or maybe no underwear.  the placement of the hands in different ways, and the one guy with the crossed legs, seem to say something of the confidence and attitude of the subjects.  

I wonder if the style of dress, and the one boy, is a clue to the profession of what seems to be a group of professionals?

comment.author: 40719832@N02
comment._content: I agree,  I think the bearded man sitting so precariously is blind...there's something definitely different about him...I want to hug him for some weird reason...great picture-
